title: (x) "Fair Grounds" company logo on website - Monotype Script {BJ Harvey, Jan E}
content:
I am redesigning the website for this company and need to ID the font so I can recreate the logo.

Any clues? The closest I’ve been able to find is a font called ’Creampuff’, it’s close but not quite it.

[http://www.fairgroundscoffee.com/Portals/1/Skins/ElliotsSkin/Default\_r2\_...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014010930/http:/www.fairgroundscoffee.com/Portals/1/Skins/ElliotsSkin/Default_r2_c1.gif "http://www.fairgroundscoffee.com/Portals/1/Skins/ElliotsSkin/Default\_r2\_c1.gif")

 [‹ (x) Stories of Sickness serif body copy - Electra {Marc O, Jan E}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014010930/http:/typophile.com/node/40097 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Likewise logo sans serif w/ rounded "w" - House Chalet {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014010930/http:/typophile.com/node/40081 "Go to next forum topic")
author: popstalin

comments.content:
I think it’s [Script MT](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014010930/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/script-mt/familytree.html), squooshed.

Probably from Mecanorma (see a and s)
